snoozesoft.systray4j
Class SysTrayMenuEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      snoozesoft.systray4j.SysTrayMenuEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SysTrayMenuEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Instances of this class are passed to systray menu listeners who want to be informed whenever a systray icon or a menu item is clicked.
The sender of this event can be extracted either directly by accessing the source member, or looking at the action command of this event.

See Also:
